评论详情: We bought this product several times to get the correct sizing, it took a long time! Sizing was not accurate

We ordered a small, but the waist was too small. Ordered a medium; my daughter tried them on and they fit well. She didn't wear them as it was warm. Last week she put them on to wear for the first time and the entire zipper came off the pants. Too late to return. Will not be buying another pair.

I used the size chart when I got these and they fit fine length wise but the waist is WAY too big they don't even stay up on my hips. The material is also really cheap feeling and scratchy and your skin.

评论概述: Seems to be a Good Product

评论详情: Loose fit, true to size.  I ordered these for my granddaughter she picked them off the website and they were perfect. Her number was a 27 so I matched it to the size that was advertised and it was exactly what she wanted.

评论概述: Product quality was fine, just didn't fit but I was unable to get at valid return address
评论详情: Product was fine, but didn't fit well.  Was not able to get a valid return address from seller. Return shipping label did not contain a real address which was confirmed by Amazon Customer Service.  Also, the seller expected me to pay return postage.
Bought these for my daughter. Used the sizing chart and there still 4 sizes to big !
My daughter asked for these because she likes the long, baggy look.  They are not long. They are cute pants, but they do not fit as pictured or as described.

My 16 year old daughter is 5'4" and weighs 100lbs.  We got her a small in accordance to the size chart. Not only did they stop an inch above her ankle, they were so tight she couldn't zip them. The legs weren't even loose fitting. They were returned and we went with a different company.
I brought these for my daughter that’s 51 and weighs 125 pounds. They couldn’t fasten up and they didn’t come past her ankles

评论概述: So small my niece could not get over her thighs
评论详情: Way too small.  So small we’re not going to reorder because we don’t know how many sizes up we would have to go
Pants are not really long for the sizing options. If you are taller than 5ft6. Don't buy. If your children are still growing don't buy.
The style and fit were not big or baggy on the bottom very disappointing
